column4: I'm planning on dualbooting my computer.. running only 10.10 atm, so i want to install Win XP from CD and after that reinstall 10.10.. but i can't install windows xp.. it crashes when loading setup.. could it have anything to do with hdd format?
ubuntu god's don't want you to use windows ;)
hehe, well.. it's so that another person can use it for games.. :P
